# NSTextSelectionNavigation.WritingDirection.leftToRight

**Case**

The value that defines the left to right writing direction.

## Declaration

```swift
case leftToRight
```

## Writing directions

- **NSTextSelectionNavigation.WritingDirection.rightToLeft**: The value that defines the right to left writing direction.

items.description: The value that defines the right to left writing direction.
items.name: NSTextSelectionNavigation.WritingDirection.rightToLeft
